ygData.subject: Unfair
ygData.msgSnippet: I feel it s unfair that my group takes all the damage from an NPC and a higher level spell caster (not in the group) zaps it 3 times and gets the experience.
ygData.messageBody:
I feel it's unfair that my group takes all the damage from an NPC and a higher level spell caster (not in the group) zaps it 3 times and gets the experience. That's a bunch of bull! It sucks even more when he does it 6 more times. I know this falls on the line of steal killing but I just thought it is a little unfair that spell casters can cause so much damage. I know it all evens out with warriors getting the hps and being able to take the hits and all. It just seems that you can be a spell caster and just wander around blasting others hard work and getting the (un)experience.

This is just one warrior's thoughts.

Anyone share my option or frustrations?

--
Numok lvl 12 Ogre Warrior
